document.full_text: severe thunderstorms were expected in a band from texas through to ohio on saturday with isolated tornado warnings as residents recoiled from a storm that swept the west side of st. louis, forecasters said.
document.title: thunderstorms from texas to ohio, some tornadoes
lines_and_colors: severe thunderstorms were expected in a band from texas through to ohio on saturday with isolated tornado warnings as residents recoiled from a storm that swept the west side of st. louis, forecasters said.
